    • Uses of PixelPack in imagingbook.common.filter.generic

      Methods in imagingbook.common.filter.generic with parameters of type PixelPack 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GenericFilter.applyTo​(PixelPack source)
      Applies this filter to the given PixelPack instance, which is modified.
      protected abstract float[] GenericFilterVector.doPixel​(PixelPack source, int u, int v)
      This method defines the steps to be performed for a single image pixel and must be implemented by any concrete sub-class.
      protected abstract float[] GenericFilterVectorSeparable.doPixelX​(PixelPack source, int u, int v)
      Applies a 1D filter operation in x-direction.
      protected abstract float[] GenericFilterVectorSeparable.doPixelY​(PixelPack source, int u, int v)
      Applies a 1D filter operation in y-direction.
      protected void GenericFilter.initFilter​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)
      This method is called once at the start of the filter execution.
      protected void GenericFilter.initPass​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)
      This method is called once at the start of each filter pass.
      protected abstract void GenericFilter.runPass​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)
      This method performs one pass of the filter, it must be implemented by a sub-class.
      protected void GenericFilterScalar.runPass​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)  
      protected void GenericFilterScalarSeparable.runPass​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)  
      protected void GenericFilterVector.runPass​(PixelPack sourcePack, PixelPack targetPack)  
      protected void GenericFilterVectorSeparable.runPass​(PixelPack source, PixelPack target)

    • Uses of PixelPack in imagingbook.common.image

      Subclasses of PixelPack in imagingbook.common.image 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ColorPack
      This class defines a "color stack" as a subtype of PixelPack with exactly 3 components (slices), representing a color image in a specific color space (default is sRgbColorSpace).
      Methods in imagingbook.common.image with parameters of type PixelPack 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PixelPack.copyTo​(PixelPack other)
      Copies the contents of one pixel pack to another.
      boolean PixelPack.isCompatibleTo​(PixelPack other)
      Checks is this pixel pack has the same dimensions as another pixel pack, i.e., can be copied to it.
